Create, Connect, Search, Play Football

Enjoy the ultimate fun of playing football in real life wherever you are! 
Playerfy is an app that is designed to help football enthusiasts to connect with other people interested in playing the game, find a field that is available, schedule a match, and play the game. 
All you need to do to enjoy the thrill of kicking the ball and scoring the goal is to join Playerfy. 

Here Is What You Need To Do
1. Make a profile on Playerfy.
2. Create or join a team.
3. Invite friends or other players. 
4. Create or join matches.
5. Turn up at the match field/venue.
6. PLAY FOOTBALL! 

Once you have finished playing there is more you can do. You can:
1. Rate users
2. Track your feedback
This will help you connect with people who have similar skills and also, help you while picking your own team. 

Why Playerfy? 
The App connects you with other players, teams as well as venues. 

No Team? Not Enough Players?
No more worries that you do not have enough people to play with. Just look for suitable players on the app, invite them to join your team, and turn up at the field on the scheduled date and time and play. 

Don’t want to create your own team? Just go alone. Play solo and meet new people, create your own brother or sisterhood of fellow players. 

Scheduled Games, Not your Style?
We have something for you too. Create your own games on your own time. Filter through the options and go play! 

Not in the Mood for Organizing? 
We have you covered. Use the app to create match days. Find teams to invite to your matchday. Send notifications, set the rules for participation, and enjoy the game. 

Once the game is over, use the app to give your feedback and rate the players. Of course, the others will rate you too. 

With Playerfy on your phone, you will always have a team to join or a game to play. 
Multiple Play Modes

Playerfy lets you play in several different modes. You can pick to be: 
1. Solo player - one who is not part of any team or has any friends but wants to play the game. 
2. Team player - As part of a team of which he/she is a part or has been invited to be a part of. 
3. Manager - Create a team and manage it. 

Or create a MatchDay - Pick a venue, date and time, set the rules, invite people, and show up to play. 


The Playerfy Advantage

Playerfy is not only for people who wish to play, it also provides an opportunity for team managers and venue owners/ managers to arrange and organize matches. 

Advantages for Team Managers
• Create a better team by looking at player statistics and inviting them to join your team. 
• Keep your team engaged and in top playing condition by organizing games and inviting other teams to play with you. 

Advantages of Venue and Field Owners/ Managers
• Make the best use of your field by plugging into our calendar. 
• Give real-time updates on the availability of the field. 
• Get more people to book your venue/field.

So What are you waiting for? Join now and kick that ball around!

How to score:
* Single, double or triple tap a dart button to score a single, double or triple respectively, or long press a dart button to score.
